name: asdf-games-api
description: Backend API for ASDF Games - Game of the Week Platform

scripts.docker:db: echo 'Set POSTGRES_PASSWORD env var first!' && docker run --name asdf-postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-changeme} -e POSTGRES_DB=asdf_games -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:15
scripts.docker:db:stop: docker stop asdf-postgres && docker rm asdf-postgres

author: ASDF Team
